description: This Python script demonstrates how to create a custom tool using the Agno framework, specifically fetching top stories from Hacker News and setting up an agent with a personality to interact with these stories.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class from the agno framework used to create AI-powered agents with specific instructions and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class from the agno framework representing an OpenAI chat model.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches the top stories from Hacker News, returning a JSON string of story details.
